name: gseok-homepage-v3.0
description: gseok homepage, this page made jekyll and react
author: gyeongseok.seo <gseok.seo@gmail.com>

scripts.start: yarn clear && bundle exec jekyll serve --limit_posts 3 --livereload --incremental -o
scripts.build:real: yarn clear && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
